EducationDetails.Text: B.S., Professional Accounting, Syracuse University School of Management (Syracuse, NY)

ExperienceSummary.Description: RICHARD A. ROSEN is experienced in the management of:  Information Technology (Project Management). RICHARD A. ROSEN has 24 years of work experience, with 15 years of management experience, including a high-level position.
ExperienceSummary.ManagementStory:
The following management-related items were found:
Skilled at managing large project teams of over 100 employees including Project Managers and technical specialists

Starting on 6/1/1998, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 8 years:
	Title: Senior IT Project Manager for ABN AMRO / ING BARINGS, ING BARINGS
Starting on 6/1/1998, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 4 months:
	Title: Engagement Manager for KEANE
Starting on 4/1/1994, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 15 months:
	Title: Engagement Manager for APPLIED BUSINESS TECHNOLOGY CORP
Starting on 6/1/1986, the candidate held the following executive-level management position for 5 years and 8 months:
	Title: President

Positions.JobLevel: Senior Manager (more than 5 years management experience)
Positions.Description:
ABN AMRO is a Dutch owned global investment bank that purchased the Equity and IT operations of ING Barings

• Managed $1M - $10M complex global infrastructure projects for ING Barings and ABN AMRO involving North America, the UK, Asia and Latin America with a project staff of 30 from initiation to production
• Managed many projects at ING Barings and ABN AMRO including the North American rollout of 3500 workstations to a standard workstation environment, the conversion of 11 Latin American offices from CC:Mail to Outlook, build-out of a 500 position state of the art trading floor, the move of 3000 employees to a new facility, and move of Data Center to a new location
• Performed all IT project management tasks, including planning, scheduling, scope management, change management, risk management, issue resolution and resource management
• Launched Tactical Solutions, Inc. consulting business from single IT Project Manager contract assignment at ING Barings to an $8M firm
• Led the day-to-day activities and overall development of company, including P&L responsibility, business development, staff management, and client management
• Successfully maintained dual roles for 7 years as IT Project Manager at ING Barings and ABN AMRO and President of Tactical Solutions working very efficiently and effectively
• Established an extensive network of contacts with senior IT managers at Wall Street firms through an aggressive marketing and sales strategy driving 30% growth for 7 years
• Leveraged reputation of "Getting the Job Done" at ING Barings and ABN AMRO as IT Project Manager to expand Tactical Solutions business by 300% and adding 30 additional billable staff

A start-up joint venture with 300 employees between State Street Bank and Watson Wyatt Worldwide providing benefits outsourcing to Fortune 50 companies

• Senior member of IT Project Management Office responsible for developing predictable and repeatable processes for IT Project Managers implementing benefit outsourcing solutions for Fortune 50 firms
• Created easy to use templates for documenting client requirements, functional specifications, and technical specifications complementing the in-house system development life cycle
• Defined meaningful metrics to be captured and stored on projects
• Developed dashboard guages to communicate project status
• Developed and implemented formal project reviews
• Performed oversight of IT Project Managers including review of client implementation project plans and schedules for completeness, resource over/under usage, and sanity check of delivery dates
• Led a failing project through an aggressive turnaround resulting in the successful mailing of 150K 1099R/W-2 forms to retirees for 3 Fortune 50 companies avoiding millions of dollars in penalties
• Worked closely with the CEO to develop and implement a business plan that analyzed various options for converting the Pension Payroll line of business from one provider to another

Taxonomies.Name: Call Center or Help Desk or Customer Service

LanguageCompetencies.FoundInContext: ABN AMRO is a Dutch owned global investment bank

ResumeData.QualificationsSummary:
SKILLS SUMMARY:

• Extensive experience building Project / Program Offices for Fortune 1000 companies such as Morgan Stanley, Brown Brothers Harriman & Bell Atlantic using the ABT suite of Project Management tools, which is now called the Niku Clarity product suite
• Worked as a Senior Project Manager at ABN AMRO, ING Barings, and Citibank
• Proficient at project management tools including MS Project and Niku Clarity product suite
• Over 10 years project management experience successfully planning and managing complex enterprise wide projects ranging in size from $1M-$10M
• Expert at task planning and management, budget planning and management, communication planning, scope management, change management and risk management
• Skilled at managing large project teams of over 100 employees including Project Managers and technical specialists
• Excellent client-facing skills at both the technical and managerial levels
• Extensive experience building and managing client relationships with senior level managers providing them with technical expertise and project direction
• Proven track record of managing consulting engagements to consistently achieve revenue and profit targets
• Over 6 years experience building and operating a very profitable $8M IT staffing company gaining a deep understanding of start-ups, new ventures and P&L responsibilities

Findings.Message: Each section type should only appear once in a resume.
An email address was not found in the contact information. A resume should always include an email address.
A street level address was not found in the contact information. A full contact address should always be included in a resume as it allows for location based searches.
Every position in a resume should have an employer name.
We found no work history positions within the past year. A resume should include work history information, including time off, for the most recent year.
